title: Plays Well With Others
description: Paisley Szuzman came to the Laurel Ridge Ranch in Daly, Wyoming to interview for an administrative position, but she’s shocked, and secretly aroused, to find that the job might entail more than she envisioned. Anyone filling this spot must meet the criteria of plays well with others, and the “others” are the men on the ranch— four hunky cowboys who are pure, rugged temptations. Adventurous to the core, Paisley takes the challenge and finds more in store for her than she ever imagined.
author: Brynn Paulin
